bio: Data Analyst ,Core contributor,Instructor, Content creator,Community moderator
impactDescription:
I'll give you an example:

* An overview into Gyroscope E-CLP on Beethoven Optimism:
Gyroscope protocol was very popular due to its eclp pools and its high TVL which was increasing every day...they announced that they will launch their next eclp for wETH/wstETH pair about beethoven (source: https://x.com/GyroStable/status/1676610455010263040?s=20 ) which was launched on July 20 (source: https://x.com/GyroStable/status/1682043945990393858?s=20 )
Then I created this dashboard to show that this new LST-based pool has high capital efficiency and users can trust it... (source: https://x.com/Mrfti_plus/status/1691527576416645120?s=20 
and https://x.com/Mrfti_plus/status/1691528693842104322?s=20 )
TVL grew so quickly from $20,000 (original TVL) to $5 million (at the time of writing)
